# Indian Trade Mart - Website Guide for AI

This file provides information about the Indian Trade Mart website structure and content for AI crawlers.

## Website Overview

Indian Trade Mart is a B2B marketplace platform connecting buyers and suppliers across India.

## Main Sections

### Key Pages


### Application Routes

- /management
- /admin/register/superadmin
- /admin/register/superadmin/dashboard
- /migration-tools
- /unauthorized
- /vendor/*
- /buyer/*
- /admin/*
- /employee/*
- /career/*
- /hr/*
- /*

## Important Notes

- Directory pages follow the pattern: /directory/{service}-in-{city}-{state}
- Vendor profiles: /directory/vendor/{vendorId}
- Product pages: /products/{productId}
